basic.description: This course provides a historical understanding of the material and spiritual bases for the reentry of Western Christendom into the Mediterranean world; the ways in which Crusaders organized, financed, and participated in Crusades and the impact this had on European institutions and thought; and the interrelations of Christians (East and West) and the Muslim world in the period of the Crusades.
basic.subject: EUH
basic.title: The Crusades
